channel.title: Z_systems on Net Telescope Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Z_systems on Net Telescope Lab

item.title: Research
item.description: About Net Telescope Lab Net Telescope Lab (NT-Lab) is a research team headed by Dr. Yen-Hung Chen, locating in National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences (NTUNHS), Taipei. Our Focusing domain We are working on: Observing significant changes in connectivity geolocated to East Asia region, Identifying large-scale events happened on the Internet, Establishing agenda, alternatives, and national/business policies

item.title: Our People
item.description: Principal Investigator Name Dr. Yen-Hung Chen (陳彥宏) Email pplong.ch+lab @ gmail.com yenhung @ ntunhs.edu.tw Website https://mastodon.social/@pplong Publications Publications List Currently Focusing on Observing significant changes in connectivity geolocated to East Asia region Identifying large-scale events happened on the Internet Establishing agenda, alternatives, and national/business policies considering above issues Expertise Network Protocol Design Network Performance Evaluation National Telecomm. Policy Shaping Experience 2017-Now: Assistant Professor, Dept. of Information
